name: Get Domain Reputation
description: Retrieve domain reputation and risk assessment from DomainTools Iris Investigate API, including risk scores, threat indicators, proximity analysis, and security classifications to identify potentially malicious domains

domain.description: The domain name to assess for reputation and risk score (e.g., example.com)

limit_exceeded.description: Indicates if the API response limit per page has been exceeded

has_more_results.description: Indicates if additional results are available beyond the current response

message.description: Status message from DomainTools API (e.g., 'Enjoy your data.')

results_count.description: Number of domain results returned in the current response

total_count.description: Total number of matching domain records available

results.description: Array of domain reputation results containing risk scores, threat components, proximity analysis, and security classifications

missing_domains.description: Array of domain names that were queried but not found in the DomainTools database
